Where World-Class Production Meets Paradise

Bringing together international production standards, comprehensive support, and Bali's creative spirit

Viking sunset studios

We are Viking Sunset Studio We are Bali's premier film production facility, crafted with passion and expertise. Our studio specializes in comprehensive production services, from state-of-the-art shooting spaces to post-production excellence.

Viking Sunset Studios

Tabanan, Bali
Bungalow Pool Studio Beach Area

Excellence in Every Frame,
Success in Every Project

Our track record of successful projects, backed by cutting-edge technology and comprehensive production support, ensures your vision is brought to life with precision and excellence.

As Southeast Asia's premier production facility, we've carefully crafted every aspect of our offering to ensure your creative vision becomes reality. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in three key pillars that set us apart:

  • World-Class Facilities & Technology
  • Strategic Location & Support
  • Full-Service Production Solutions
